QuestData.Title: To Be Horde...
QuestData.Description: Stand by me, $n, and watch as our mighty weapon destroys our enemies!$B$BLearn what it means to be Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn what it means to be Horde.
QuestData.RewardText: Now you truly know what it means to be a member of the Horde, $n.

Objectives.Objective: Learn what it means to be Horde.
